Choose a faction (required) and any ship types (optional) or any extension (optional) then press the update button. Save or print using the browser's print command.

Quick builds are layed out for an 11" wide page. For 8.5"x11", use landscape to have 1 quick build per page. For 11"x17", use portrait and 3 quick builds will be printed on each page, which can be cut in thirds, except for some quick builds at the start which require half of the 17" page.

Quick builds with generic pilots and few upgrades are repeated across a row so a player can use that quick build more than once.
